Question: Urban population - floating
Help Text: Daily commuters, tourists, seasonal workers, etc. Include high seasons if applicable

Question: Metropolitan population - floating
Help Text: Daily commuters, tourists, seasonal workers, etc. Include high seasons if applicable

Question: Average urban population growth
Help Text: Percentage, yearly average within last 5 to 10 years

Question: Projection of urban population growth
Help Text: Percentage, average yearly estimate for the next 5 to 10 years

Question: Mortality rate
Help Text: Per 100,000 people, specified by gender and age

Question: Ethnic group(s)
Help Text: Percentage of population within social, cultural and/or religious groups. Specify if there is a particular geographical distribution, such as a neighbourhood with a majority of a certain group

Question: Official language(s)
Help Text: Official language(s) spoken and percentage of speaking population

Question: Official language(s), unintelligibility
Help Text: Percentage of population that do not understand any of the language(s) used for official communication

Question: Other spoken language(s)
Help Text: Other main languages spoken and percentage of speaking population
